text: Ni shuo:“[Zuozheng shi] zuida de zhengju shi shenme?” Ni shuo:“An la [ji zuida de zhengju] shi wo yu nimen zhi jian de jianzheng, zhe bu “gulanjing” shi qishi wo de [zhu 1], yibian wo yong ta lai jinggao nimen he ta suo neng daoda zhe [zhu 2]. Nandao nimen zhen de neng zuozheng chu an la wai hai you qita [ying shou chongbai de] zhuzai ma?” Ni shuo:“Wo jue buneng zheyang zuozheng.” Ni shuo:“Ta [an la] zhishi du yi de zhu, wo yu nimen suo chongbai de ouxiang que shi hao wu guanxi de.”
